active.description: Indicates if the greeting is currently active or not

audio_name.description: Name of the audio file for the greeting

audio_url.description: URL to access the audio file for the greeting

category_id.description: ID of the category to which the greeting belongs

default.description: Indicates if the greeting is set as the default

has_sub_settings.description: Indicates if the greeting has sub settings or not

ivr_ids.description: List of IVR IDs associated with the greeting

pending.description: Indicates if the greeting is pending for approval

phone_number_ids.description: List of phone number IDs linked to the greeting

upload_id.description: ID of the uploaded audio file for the greeting
